property.name: authenticationQuery
property.value: select pwd from huser where phone = ?

property.name: userRolesQuery
property.value: select r.rname from huser u, roleuser ur, role r where u.huid = ur.huid and ur.rid = r.rid and u.phone = ?

property.name: permissionsQuery
property.value: select j.jurl from role r, rolejur rp, jur j where r.rid = rp.rid and rp.jid = j.jid and r.rname = ?
